            "createBy": "{{createBy}}"
        },
        {
            "action": "Add",
            "ruleId": "TM{{$timestamp}}",
            "ruleSeq": "{{$randomBankAccount}}",

            "createBy": "{{createBy}}"
        }
    ]
}

body.raw:
{
    "sourceSystem": "{{sourceSystem}}",
    "ruleList": [
        {
            "action": "Add",
            "ruleId": "TM{{$timestamp}}",
            "ruleSeq": "{{$randomBankAccount}}",
            "contractRuleName": "in_package",
            "contractRuleValue": "Device_Android Watch",
            "createBy": "{{createBy}}"
        },
                {
            "action": "Add",
            "ruleId": "TM{{$timestamp}}",
            "ruleSeq": "{{$randomBankAccount}}",
            "contractRuleName": "First Package",
            "contractRuleValue": "Device_Android Watch",
            "createBy": "{{createBy}}"
        },
                        {
            "action": "Add",
            "ruleId": "TM{{$timestamp}}",
            "ruleSeq": "{{$randomBankAccount}}",
            "contractRuleName": "Initial Package",
            "contractRuleValue": "Device_Android Watch",
            "createBy": "{{createBy}}"
        },
                          {
            "action": "Add",
            "ruleId": "TM{{$timestamp}}",
            "ruleSeq": "{{$randomBankAccount}}",
            "contractRuleName": "Min Price",
            "contractRuleValue": "99",
            "createBy": "{{createBy}}"
        }
    ]
}
